name: The Odyssey (itch) (Gregory Keng Strasser)
description:
"The Odyssey" is a video project I made after taking a college course to test my ability in RenPy. This is not meant for sale or distribution. It's to showcase my coding and adaptation abilities.

Translation by Robert Fitzgerald

Adaptation by me

Graphics are taken from:

  • Namco Tales Studio 
  • Thomas Cole Paintings

Music includes:

  • Traditional Albanian Eagle Dance
  • "Winds of Ithaca" by Antti Martikainen
